description: Contains information about a prepared unit of blood.  These fields will be populated via an interface.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The ID of a finding (RES) that contains the information that matches blood to a certain patient. This record holds information like the unit number, product, expiration, and blood type.

columns.name: BLOOD_UNIT_NUMBER
columns.description: The primary identifier for the blood product. This is not necessarily unique. Populated via interface for the 'Prepare' order of blood.

columns.name: BLOOD_CODING_SYS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the coding system used for the Unit Number.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


ISBT 128


ABC CODABAR

columns.name: BLOOD_PRODUCT_CODE
columns.description: Secondary identifier to be paired with unit number (when dealing with divisions of a unit of blood).

columns.name: BLOOD_CODABAR_REG
columns.description: The CODABAR registration number from the bag of blood associated with this record.

columns.name: BLOOD_CODABAR_MAP
columns.description: Contains the two-digit mapping of the CODABAR registration number that appears in the external unit number.

columns.name: BLOOD_EXP_DTTM
columns.description: The expiration date for a unit of blood (from the interface).

columns.name: BLOOD_UNIT_TYPE
columns.description: The blood type (barcode data) of a unit of blood (from the interface).
